about_me.text: I am a developer with over 10 years of experience. I work with C #, ASP, PHP, JS (JQuery, Json, Ajax ...), AS, SQL (MS / MY), HTML5, CSS ... I have developed powerful data collection and processing applications. I know how to optimize when the standard framework fails and doesn't want to handle a large data stream (multiple thread conflicts). I can develop plugins for ready-made projects and much more.
